titles.title: Climate Neutral Electricity Generation Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an investment credit for electric generation facilities with climate neutral combustion.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/13/2007--Introduced. Climate Neutral Electricity Generation Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax credit for investment in a climate neutral combustion facility. Defines "climate neutral combustion facility" as any facility which: (1) burns matter to produce electricity; (2) captures and uses carbon dioxide released during combustion to recover hydrocarbon fuel; and (3) produces no emissions of mercury or greenhouse gasses and no emissions that form fine particulate, smog, or acid rain
